member.summary: The exit code returned by the tool.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Coyote.Cli.ExitCode.Success
member.summary: Indicates that the tool terminated successfully.
member.remarks: If the tool run in test mode, it also indicates that no bugs were found.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Coyote.Cli.ExitCode.Error
member.summary: Indicates that the tool terminated with an error.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Coyote.Cli.ExitCode.BugFound
member.summary: Indicates that a bug was found during testing.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Coyote.Cli.ExitCode.InternalError
member.summary: Indicates that the tool terminated with an internal error.
